value: A thinking golfer’s course, the fairways at Butternut Farm Golf Club in Stow, MA, put a premium on shot accuracy.
Our course is known for its impeccable, pristine condition and having the longest hole in the country without a sand trap.

pricing_level.description: Represents upper mid-tier layouts, popular resort off-peak rates, and weekend discounts

pricing_information.value: 2025 Daily Rates Fees | Weekdays | | | Monday – Friday (18 holes) | $55.00 | | Monday – Thursday (9 holes) | $38.00 | | Monday – Thursday Seniors (Ages 55+) (18 Holes With Cart) | $55.00 | | Monday – Thursday Seniors (Ages 55+) (18 Holes Walking) | $38.00 | | Saturday, Sundays, Holidays | | | Before 12 PM | $68.00 | | After 12 PM | $58.00 | | After 3 PM | $48.00 | | Drive Carts | | | 18 Holes per person | $24.00 | | 9 Holes per person | $14.00 | | Pull Carts | $7.00 | Booking Tee Times – All Tee Times need to be booked in advance – online or over the phone at 978-897-3400 X2. Payment – You can pay online or with a credit card over the phone 978-897-3400 X2. No rain checks.

food_beverage_options_description.value: The Grille offers a variety of food and beverage options.

value: The course is known for its pristine condition, value and very friendly, warm staff.
Longest hole in the country without a sand trap.

contact_for_events.value: Call the Butternut Farm Golf Club pro shop for tournament information at (978) 897-3400, ext. 12.

course_policies.value: All Tee Times need to be booked in advance – online or over the phone at 978-897-3400 X2. Payment – You can pay online or with a credit card over the phone 978-897-3400 X2. No rain checks.
